p: Based on the observations during the 2009 pandemic, it has been suggested that aboriginal communities should be prioritised during vaccination [ 63, 64]. However the predictions in Table 7 suggest that at least from the perspective of HLA alleles and downstream CTL response, each influenza strain and each aboriginal community needs to be assessed independently. Using our model, it is possible to predict whether or not a new strain will cause a worse epidemic than a strain in the data set, within the constraints of the assumptions made. Predictions such as these could help optimise the deployment of resources when combating a new strain of influenza.
